content.rendered:
Fees incurred when the extra piece is exceeded (per item)

Area1　North America/Latin America/Hawaii
Area2　Europe/Africa/Middle East
Area3　Asia（including Japan)/Oceania

For travel across
the above area
e.g.) North America⇔ Japan		 For travel within the
above area
e.g.）Japan ⇔Thai(*2)(*3)(*4)		 Japan domestic sector (*1)(*2)
3rd or more checked
baggage		 20,000 Yen
USD200
CAD200
EUR150		 10,000 Yen
USD100
CAD100
EUR75		 JPY 5,000

Fees incurred when the baggage weight/size limit is exceeded (per item)

Area1　North America/Latin America/Hawaii
Area2　Europe/Africa/Middle East
Area3　Asia（including Japan)/Oceania

For travel across
the above area
e.g.) North America⇔ Japan		 For travel within the
above area
e.g.）Japan ⇔Thai(*2)(*3)(*5)		 Japan domestic sector (*1)(*2)
Overweight
Greater than 23 kg
up to 32 kg		 6,000 Yen
USD60
CAD60
EUR45		 6,000 Yen
USD60
CAD60
EUR45		 1,000 Yen
Overweight
Greater than 32 kg
up to 45 kg (*3)		 20,000 Yen
USD200
CAD200
EUR150		 20,000 Yen
USD200
CAD200
EUR150		 5,000 Yen
Oversized
Greater than 158 cm
up to 292 cm (*3)		 20,000 Yen
USD200
CAD200
EUR150		 20,000 Yen
USD200
CAD200
EUR150		 5,000 Yen

For more details visit : https://www.All Nippon Airways.com .lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

All Nippon Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage

All Nippon Airways Checked Baggage
